title: CAN'T PLAY
body: WHEN I TAP THE "PLAY" BUTTON AND START PVP AND I CHOOSE BLIND PICK.... AFTER THAT I STARTED THE GAME AND THEN I CANT FIND A LOBBY SO... I WAITED FOR 1 HOUR TO FIND THE GAME BUT IT DOESNT. PLS FIX THIS I REALLY WANT TO PLAY A GAME WITH MY FRIENDS..

replies.body: It looks like EUNE is still having server issues.  Eambo is providing updates on the [service status post](https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements-en/tbyHzasZ-eune-emergency-platform-restart).  All hands are on deck towards resolving this!
I am having the same problems i havn't been able to play for over 2 hours guess i ain't playing league any time soon :(
